title: 100 d√≠as para enamorarse
overview: Laura and Antonia are lifelong friends, but they are water and oil, they adore and complement each other. In the couples of both there is love and wear; the passage of time finds them holding a marriage of 18 years and with children. The two conclude that they are in a stage where there seems to be only one opportunity for things to be different. Will they be willing to put love to the test?
